## ğŸ“¥ Installation

Download the latest version for your browser:

- **Chrome/Edge/Opera/Brave**: `geminix-chrome-{VERSION}.zip`
- **Firefox**: `geminix-firefox-{VERSION}.zip`
- **Safari**: `geminix-{VERSION}.dmg`

See [README](https://github.com/Nagi-ovo/geminix#-installation) for installation instructions.

---

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Nagi-ovo/geminix/compare/{PREV_VERSION}...{VERSION}
